titleStmt.title: Anno quarto et quinto, Philippi & Mariæ. Actes made at a Parliament begon and holden at Westminster, the .xx daye of January, in the fourth and fift yeare of the reigne of oure soueraigne Lorde and Lady, Philippe and Marye by the grace of God, kinge and Quene of England, Spayne, Fraunce, both the Sicilles, Jerusalem, and Jrelande, defendours of the faith, archidukes of Austria, dukes of Burgondie, Millaine and Brabant, counties of Haspurge, Flaunders, and Tyrol, and there continued and kepte vntyll the vij. day of Marche, then next folowinge, and enacted as foloweth..
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.
Philip II, King of Spain, 1527-1598.

publicationStmt.publisher: in aedibus Iohannis Cavvodi Tipographi Regiæ Maiestatis.,

notesStmt.note: Title in illustrated border (McK. & Ferg. 81); initials.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Wales.

place.placeName: aedibus Iohannis Cavvodi Tipographi Regiæ Maiestatis.
